titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Edward Robert DeZurko architecture typescripts, 1953, 1957 MS 347

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-01 21:32:21 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: The collection includes a holograph of Edward R. DeZurko's doctoral dissertation submitted to the Institiute of Fine Arts, New York University, April 1, 1953: "Functionalist Trends in Writings Pertaining to Architecture with Special Emphasis on the Period ca. 1700-1850." The collection also includes the typewritten manuscript of his recent book, Origins of Functionalist Theory, published by the Columbia University Press. The manuscript contains copious corrections by the author including instructions to the printer. In addition he has given to the Rice Library the corrected galley proof and the page proof.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Edward Robert De Zurko is the author of Origins of Functionalist Theory.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the holograph of DeZurko's 1953 doctoral dissertation "Functional Trends in Writing Pertaining to Architecture with Special Emphasis on Period ca. 1700-1850." Also included are the typescript and galley proof of the book Origins of Functionalist Theory.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Collection was a gift of Edward Robert De Zurko. Received on June 18, 1965.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edward Robert De Zurko architecture typescripts, 1953, 1957, MS 347, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Edward Robert De Zurko architecture typescripts must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

did.unittitle: Series I: Edward Robert DeZurko architecture typescripts
Origins of Functionalist Theory: manuscript, galley proof, and page proof
"Functionalist Trends in Writings Pertaining to Architecture with Special Emphasis on the Period ca. 1700-1850": holograph of doctoral dissertation.
